title: Trump launches Twitter tirade against Fox News’ Ed Henry
text:
Trump’s fusillade began with a re-tweet of someone named Joe (@nallieman) who wrote: “Ed Henry just got his ASS handed to him by Mark Levin. Yes Ed, go ask Joe Biden.”

Trump interjected his own opinions — at one point, he stated “So great Mark!” with a link to Mediaite’s coverage of the interview — but mostly relied on re-tweets. Several of the tweets that he picked up suggested Henry belonged on CNN instead of Fox News.

The oddest was a re-tweet of a Twitter user named Trump But About Sharks (@tbasharks) that claims as its mission: “Trump apparently hates sharks, so this bot does some word replacement on his tweets to make them about sharks.“ In that spirit, that tweet referred to “the pro-shark media.”

RT @BulldawgDerek: @foxandfriends A Sunday Morning; Amen Mark Levin, Preach Brother! You shut down Ed Henry and the Pro Shark Media with the fac… — Trump But About Sharks (@tbasharks) September 29, 2019

The final tweet in the sequence featured a tweet by Republican National Committee leader Ronna McDaniel (@GOPChairmwoman), in which she wrote: “Voters don't support this impeachment charade & it’s going to backfire come 2020!“ In that spirit, the president wrote in response: “Will happen to all of those seeking unlawful impeachment in 50 Trump type Districts. We will win big!“

Trump has been more critical of Fox News than ever before in recent months, taking digs at their coverage at times. In August, for instance, he complained about an appearance by Democratic National Committee spokesperson Xochitl Hinojosa. Earlier in the year, he chastised Fox for hosting presidential forums for Democratic presidential candidates, and he’s also attacked the network for its polling results.
